QuestData.Title: The Path of Conquest
QuestData.Description: My gryphon riders have come back with a bit of news! The Eclipsion blood elves are planning something big. They've begun forming their armies at the Path of Conquest, located east of here - adjacent to Eclipse Point.$B$BI want you to travel to the Path of Conquest and assess the situation. Once you've done so, use this flare gun to signal a gryphon rider. One will swoop down from the sky to meet you. Tell 'em what you've discovered and they'll give you the next set of orders.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to the Path of Conquest in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you to report, soldier?
QuestData.RewardText: Indeed, these troublesome whelps are up to something insidious. We must investigate further...
